name: Unhatched
description:
Unhatched is a story driven card puzzler with unique card-swiping mechanics. Play as a young dragon trainer, meet strange characters and find useful cards. Swipe your way to freedom through over 200+ story cards and 20+ puzzles!

Features:
- 20+ card based puzzles,
- No randomness, solve every puzzle with skill only,
- Unique mechanic, every card has different effects depending how you swipe it,
- Story that unfolds based on your choices and solved puzzles,
- No in-apps, no ads,
- One handed play,
- Adaptive difficulty. Stuck on a puzzle? It won’t stop your progress!

For more info, please visit http://unhatched-game.com, https://www.facebook.com/unhatchedgame or join the discussion on our discord https://discord.gg/WfZFzv2
